an10.189:1: "Bhikkhus, I will teach you the noble path and the ignoble path. Listen and attend closely ….And what, bhikkhus, is the ignoble path? The destruction of life … and wrong view. This is called the ignoble path.
an10.189:2: "And what, bhikkhus, is the noble path? Abstention from the destruction of life … and right view. This is called the noble path."
